OverallGame

Class gameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • OverallGame.gameView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game1iView, Game1View, Game2iView, Game2View, Game3iView, Game3View, Game4iView, Game4View, MenuView

    public abstract class gameView
extends java.lang.Object
    gameView is an abstract class used as a mold for the view of each game
    Version:
    5/17
    Author:
    Team 7

      • loadImages

        public abstract void loadImages()
        Loads the needed images for the game

      • createImage

        protected boolean createImage(java.lang.String imgName)
        Reads in the filename of an image, pulls the image and resizes it with correct scaling, then adds it to the HashMap of images
        Parameters:
        imgName - name of the image wanting to be loaded in
        Returns:
        Returns true if loading the image was successful, returns false if an exception was caught

      • resizeImg

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage resizeImg(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                                     int newW,
                                                     int newH)
        Resizes the image to the appropriate width and height using the scaling of the game window
        Parameters:
        img - image being resized
        newW - width of image wanted
        newH - height of image wanted
        Returns:
        Returns the image with new dimensions

      • scaleW

        public int scaleW(double x)
        Takes the width of an image and scales it to the appropriate size for the current screen
        Parameters:
        x - Width of image that needs to be scaled
        Returns:
        Returns scaled width for image

      • scaleH

        public int scaleH(double x)
        Takes the height of an image and scales it to the appropriate size for the current screen
        Parameters:
        x - Height of image that needs to be scaled
        Returns:
        Returns scaled height for image
